description:
Note: This package has been deprecated/renamed to `nift`

      See https://chocolatey.org/packages/nift

      install: `choco install nift`
		
      Nift (aka nsm) is a cross-platform open source git-like and
      LaTeX-like command-line dynamic and static site generator.
		
      See https://nift.cc

      **Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is 
      out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
      let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
author: Nick Ham
